Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2012 01:54PM umater wrote: Hi all, my hair is just coming back, it is thick and curly and out of control, I just had a trim thinking it would look better, but I cannot style it,  It is only about 1/2 to an inch long but going everywhere out of control.  Does anyone have the name of a good website that has pictures of post chemo hair?  I am looking at the net, but there are so many and I have been unable to find anything good.  Any advice would be appreciated.....thanks so much.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
